text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Suzukaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Suzuka! Ohhh, you were really<n>zoom'n out there!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Spe.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I agree. You truly gave us aremarkable race. Even my legsare itching to race after seeing that.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: What a performance...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: But I won't let you leave me inthe dust.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I am also filled to bursting with<n>inspiration! Please, please,
please run<n>with me, Suzuka!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Goodness me... That was indeed very<n>exciting.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Tachyon?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Your performance today has taken<n>Umamusume to new
heights. A<n>historic moment indeed.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You and your trainer truly make for<n>the most magnificent
research<n>material.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Research material? Um... what?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Better keep those researcher eyes<n>peeled then. There'll be
plenty of<n>views of Silence Suzuka winning from<n>now on.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Heh... I look forward to that.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Well, you can't stick around all day.<n>You've an awards
ceremony to<n>attend.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Well, you can't stick around all day.<n>You've an awards
ceremony to<n>attend.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes, you're right.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for your support,<n>everyone. I heard each and
every one<n>of your voices on the track today.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Including yours, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Well, it's my job to give you the push<n>you need. Besides,
you did exactly<n>what I asked of you...
choice_data_list: You came back to me. Welcome home.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Well, it's my job to give you the push<n>you need. Besides,
you did exactly<n>what I asked of you...
choice_data_list: You came back to me. Welcome home.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe... It's good to be back.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Anyway, I should get going. We'll talk<n>later.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm... It seems she didn't take to<n>being called research
material.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I suppose what we call her doesn't<n>matter, but if I had to
say...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: She doesn't just carry the hopes anddreams of others... She is ourhopes and dreams.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah, that sums it up perfectly.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah, that sums it up perfectly.

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: Suzukaaa! Thank you for that<n>incredible race!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: You better keep running your heart<n>out!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Thank you, everyone. Your cheers of<n>encouragement were
what pushed me<n>forward.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
And I plan to keep going, running<n>towards that beautiful
scenery time<n>and time again. So please...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I hope you'll enjoy the view of me<n>from the stands just as
much!
